title: ExamineXmat
description: A program for examining the design matrix generated by 3dDeconvolve.

interactive.title: Interactive mode
interactive.description: Run ExamineXmat in interactive mode. This is the default if -prefix is not given. If -interactive is used with -prefix, the last plot you see is the plot saved to file.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Prefix of plot image and cor image

select.title: Select
select.description: What to plot. Selection strings to specify regressors.

msg_trace.title: Message trace flag
msg_trace.description: Output trace information along with errors and notices.

verbosity.title: Verbosity level
verbosity.description: Verbosity level. 0 for quiet, 1 or more for talkative.
